entities.name: hippogriﬀ
entities.description: The hippogriﬀ is making frantic attempts to get to Hagrid again.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid was making frantic attempts to get to the hippogriﬀ again; Harry seized his rope too, straining to hold Buckbeak back.

entities.name: buckbeak
entities.description: They watched Hagrid meander tipsily up to the castle. He was gone. Buckbeak stopped ﬁghting to get away.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Barely two minutes later, the castle doors ﬂew open yet again, and Snape came charging out of them, running toward the Willow.

entities.name: willow
entities.description: Barely two minutes later, the castle doors ﬂew open yet again, and Snape came charging out of them, running toward the Willow.

relationships.description: The hippogriﬀ was making frantic attempts to get to Hagrid again.
Harry seized his rope too, straining to hold Buckbeak back.
Barely two minutes later, the castle doors ﬂew open yet again, and Snape came charging out of them, running toward the Willow.
Harry’s ﬁsts clenched as they watched Snape skid to a halt next to the tree, looking around.
